item.title: Oscillations
item.description: Oscillations # Collision Frequencies # Gases have three degrees of freedom to oscillate, but plasmas have four: the electron fluid adds an additional parameter. One way to see how the electron fluid oscillates, take a region of plasma and displace the electrons by a distance \( x \) and release. Then, watch how the electrons oscillate.
